name: Flow Chart / Workflow / Customer Journey Maker
description:
Simple template to create your own flow chart, Workflow, customer journey, what ever you want to call it.


How to use:

1. Drag a component from the Assets panel on your left

2. Change color and style of box from the override details on your right


かんたんなフローチャート、ワークフロー、カスタマージャーニー等を作成するのに使えるテンプレートです。
